testcase.name: Authentication - Optimized › should login successfully with valid credentials @smoke
Authentication - Optimized › should show error for locked user
Authentication - Optimized › should show error for invalid credentials
Authentication - Optimized › should clear fields when clicking login with empty fields
Authentication - Optimized › should maintain login button state
Authentication - Data Driven › login with standard_user should succeed
Authentication - Data Driven › login with locked_out_user should fail
Authentication - Data Driven › login with problem_user should succeed
Authentication - Data Driven › login with performance_glitch_user should succeed
